Project.name: StopWatch Demo for Haxe
Project.Description: This demo illustrates the use of the StateMachine Utility to define and navigate the states of a Finite State Machine or FSM of a working StopWatch. Xinf is used for the user interface.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in Version 1.0
  • A port of the StopWatch Demo for ActionScript 3
  • Uses the PureMVC / Haxe StateMachine Utility
  • Standard and MultiCore versions are included.
  • Xinf is used for the user interface.
Project.Installation:
Prerequisites
  • You must have Haxe 2 installed.
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a Demo_Haxe_Xinf_StopWatch_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\Demo_Haxe_Xinf_StopWatch_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
